name: Serum Price API
description: An easy to use API to know SPL Token price of the Solana blockchain

BASIC_AUTH.description: A boolean indicating whether there is a BasicAuth

BASIC_AUTH_USER.description: The username for the basic auth (leave blank if not activated)

BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD.description: The password for the basic auth (leave blank if not activated)

HOST.description: Leave as is, unless you know what you are doing

NODE_ENV.description: Leave as is, unless you know what you are doing
